Class.name: Report.INTFRPickLine
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INTFRPickLine.Company as INTFRPickLine_Company,SQLUser.INTFR.Company as INTFR_Company,SQLUser.INTFRPickLine.TransferNumber,SQLUser.INTFRPickLine.TransferPickLineNumber,SQLUser.INTFRPickLine.Item,SQLUser.INTFRPickLine.Quantity,SQLUser.INTFRPickLine.PickedQuantity,SQLUser.INTFR.TransferNumber as TransferNumberHeader,SQLUser.INTFR.SendingLocation,SQLUser.INTFR.ReceivingLocation,SQLUser.INTFR.SendingLocnName as SendingLocationName,SQLUser.INTFR.ReceivingLocnName as ReceivingLocationName,SQLUser.WWW101.ParameterDescription,SQLUser.WWW101.Language1,SQLUser.WWW101.SearchItem,SQLUser.WWW101.Text as ItemUOMDesc,SQLUser.INTFRPickLine.Unit from SQLUser.INTFRPickLine,SQLUser.INTFR,SQLUser.WWW101 where (WWW101.ParameterDescription = 'EINHEIT') and (WWW101.SearchItem = INTFRPickLine.Unit)
